name: Note-Maker
description:
This syntax file will allow text regions to be coloured differently in case of section/subsection headings, italicize text or make it bold, highlight text regions, and more depending on the structure. For those who make notes in vim, refering to them later will become faster and more efficient.

Screenshots:
The plain file:
http://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~samhita/vim/noteMakerDemoPlain.html
With the syntax file:
http://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~samhita/vim/noteMakerDemo.html
install_details:
Extract the package in your .vim folder.
The default filetype is .notes.
Detailed instructions for automatic file type detection are given in the readme file.
